name: OtterBox Bear Shields
description: Picnics are for people, not bears. Protect your OtterBox Venture cooler and your tasty meals from local wildlife by using these 2 rugged stainless steel latch covers.Works with all OtterBox Venture coolers.Includes 2 long hasp American Lock® padlocks to keep your tasty treats safe.Certified by the Interagency Grizzly Bear Committee (IGBC).Covered by OtterBox’s limited lifetime warranty.
